summary: This document contains certified corporate filings from the Delaware Division of Corporations for L.S.J. LLC, including its 1998 Certificate of Formation and a 2019 good standing certificate, produced in response to a federal subpoena. It shows the company was formed in 1998 with Russell R. Roster as the authorized person.

persons.name: Jeffrey W. Bullock
persons.context: Certifies the attached documents as true and correct copies of all documents on file for L.S.J. LLC and certifies the company's good standing as of August 26, 2019.

persons.name: Russell R. Roster
persons.context: Signed the Certificate of Formation for L.S.J. LLC on April 17, 1998, as the authorized person executing and delivering the certificate.

events.title: Formation of L.S.J. LLC
events.description: L.S.J. LLC was formed as a limited liability company under Delaware law, with its registered office at the Corporation Trust Center in Wilmington.

events.title: Federal subpoena issued
events.description: A subpoena dated August 9, 2019, signed by an Assistant United States Attorney, requested specified records of L.S.J. LLC.

events.title: Certification of L.S.J. LLC records
events.description: The Delaware Division of Corporations certified documents for L.S.J. LLC and confirmed the company was in good standing as of this date.

locations: Corporation Trust Center, 1209 Orange Street, Wilmington, New Castle County, Delaware 19801
keyFacts: L.S.J. LLC was formed on April 17, 1998, in Delaware with Russell R. Roster as the authorized person.
The company's registered agent was The Corporation Trust Company at 1209 Orange Street in Wilmington, Delaware.
As of August 26, 2019, L.S.J. LLC was in good standing with the State of Delaware and had paid all annual taxes to date.
These corporate records were produced in response to a federal subpoena dated August 9, 2019, signed by an Assistant United States Attorney.
The custodian of records declaration indicates the records were made and kept in the regular course of business, complying with Federal Rules of Evidence.
